DEFECT.DESCRIPTION: 'buf' could be '0': this does not adhere to the specification for the function 'memcpy'.

KEYEVENT.MESSAGE: 'buf' is an In/Out argument to 'memcpy' (declared at c:\program files (x86)\microsoft visual studio\2017\community\vc\tools\msvc\14.16.27023\include\vcruntime_string.h:40)
'buf' should not be NULL, because this is not consistent with the SAL annotation on 'memcpy'
